org.epics.ca.impl

Class LibraryConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.ca.impl.LibraryConfiguration

  • @Immutable
public class LibraryConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds other parameters that the user may configure to control general- purpose aspects of the CA library behaviour. This class is a singleton shared throughout the application.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LibraryConfiguration getInstance()

      • getMonitorNotifierImplementation

        public java.lang.String getMonitorNotifierImplementation()
        Returns the configuration of the CA library's monitor notification engine. See the README file for further information.
        Returns:
        the configured value.

      • isRepeaterEnabled

        public boolean isRepeaterEnabled()
        Indicates whether the CA library should start a CA Repeater instance when the first CA library context is created and stop it when the last CA library context is destroyed. When disabled the CA library will assume that a separate repeater instance has been started on the local machine and will attempt to register with that.
        Returns:
        the configured value.

      • isRepeaterOutputCaptureEnabled

        public boolean isRepeaterOutputCaptureEnabled()
        Indicates whether the output of the CA Repeater should be captured in the CA library log.
        Returns:
        the configured value.

      • getRepeaterLogLevel

        public java.util.logging.Level getRepeaterLogLevel()
        Returns the minimum level of the log messages that the CA Repeater will send to the standard output stream.
        Returns:
        the configured value.

      • getLibraryLogLevel

        public java.util.logging.Level getLibraryLogLevel()
        Returns the minimum level of log messages that the CA library will send to the standard output stream.
        Returns:
        the configured value.
